This is a school equalization program in Texas that has horribly failed because "lawyers, not economists, designed the system." as Caroline Hoxby said. http://post.economics.harvard.edu/faculty/hoxby/papers/txpaperaug2004.pdf
 
 
 Equalization should be discussed in general, however. Is it desirable for it's own sake?

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Robin Hood
